sub-events.comment: on peut probablement réduire ça avec des "either()"

action.name: Set value
action.param: angle(cubeHolder.X, cubeHolder.Y, LayoutWidth/2, LayoutHeight/2) + random(-angleVariation, angleVariation)

sub-events.comment: display score and time and everything

action.name: Set text
action.param: "score: " & score & " quickens: " & quickens & " time: " & "2m30s" & " life: " & player.lifes
